html:
Business Essentials

Welcome to "Business Essentials," a comprehensive course designed to equip you with a foundational understanding of contemporary business principles and the ability to analyse the external business environment. The module combines various teaching methodologies including lectures, group workshops, collaborative projects, and interactive assessments. You'll be expected to actively engage in discussions, organize and review lecture notes, and undertake research on assigned topics. Course materials will be accessible via the Learning Management System, Canvas. This course aims to develop your critical thinking and analytical skills, preparing you for advanced study and a promising future in the business world.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Students will be able to apply knowledge on business and management principles suitable for further study.

+  Students will be able to demonstrate understanding of key contemporary business concepts.

+  Students will gain the ability to analyse the business external environment.

Module Content:
